statements.select: SELECT T.CRN_FORK_NO,T.CRN_FORK_ENABLE,T1.*, CASE T.CRN_FORK_ENABLE WHEN 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '可用' END AS CRN_FORK_ENABLE_DESC, CASE T1.CRN_IN_ENABLE WHEN 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '可用' END AS CRN_IN_ENABLE_DESC, CASE T1.CRN_OUT_ENABLE WHEN 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '可用' END AS CRN_OUT_ENABLE_DESC FROM PSB_CRN_FORK T JOIN PSB_CRN T1 ON T1.CRN_NO = T.CRN_NO

SELECT FS.CRN_NO, FS.CRN_FORK_NO, FS.TASK_NO, CASE FS.TASK_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'M' THEN '移库' ELSE '出库' END AS TASK_TYPE, CASE WHEN T2.ERR_NAME IS NULL THEN '正常' ELSE T2.ERR_NAME END AS FAULT_NAME, FS.FROM_BIN,FS.TO_BIN,FS.ACT_POS_X,FS.ACT_POS_Y, FS.FIP_FAULT_NO, FS.FIP_DATE, FS.FIP_HANDLE_RESULT, CASE FS.FIP_FLAG WHEN 0 THEN '正常' WHEN 1 THEN '待确认' WHEN 2 THEN '已确认' WHEN 3 THEN '已处理' END AS FIP_FLAG FROM PEM_CRN_FORK_STATUS FS LEFT JOIN PSB_CRN_ERR T2 ON FS.FAULT_NO = T2.ERR_NO ORDER BY FS.CRN_NO,FS.CRN_FORK_NO
